title:
Global null controllability of stochastic semilinear complex
  Ginzburg-Landau equations
authors: Sen Zhang, Hang Gao and Ganghua Yuan
abstract:
In this paper, we study the null controllability of forward and backward
stochastic semilinear complex Ginzburg-Landau equations with global Lipschitz
nonlinear terms. For this purpose, by deriving an improved global Carleman
estimates for linear systems, we obtain the controllability results for the
stochastic linear systems with a $L^2$-valued source term. Based on it,
together with a Banach fixed point argument, the desired null controllability
of semilinear systems is derived.
